Text: Has anyone tried it already? Is the keygen working properly?

@momo
Looks like you are first so go ahead and test it and report back.

Registered on purpose to say thanks.
Keygen worked perfectly with the installer for my language that I downloaded from the corel site.
TotalVirus detection ratio is 20/41, so I ran the keygen in Sandboxie just for my security habits. Norton Internet Security 2012 reports clean.

btw, on CorelDRAW X5 with the previous Keymaker - CORE, I had the automatic updates active and it was all good with no problems, so I'm trying that with this one too.

Great great upload. Right after a few days of the release...
Thank you thank you.

I would like to say thanks for this upload. The keygen is good (as usualy from CORE). I did not block the software by firewall, and it's ok (at least to this day). 
After install they offer to make account and verify account bla.bla.. just check the box dont show this again and close that popup.
Also on installing, I choose the custom install and uncheck the option "Allow products update"
Thx uploader.

Can't install. :( 
When I run the setup, the agree license thing popup. But I need to click the "next" button, but I seem to have 2 of them, and they both don't respond. :(

@Umpie 

1. Download "Perfect Uninstaller" and uninstall your first attempts. 

2. Disconnect your internet and disable your anti-virus.

3. Install X6

4. Open keygen while X6 installation screen is popped up.

5. Do not close keygen

6. Enter serial in X6 

7. Copy Activation code from X6 install screen and enter it in keygen 

8. Press for "activation"  code on keygen and place it back on X6 install screen

9. enjoy CorelDraw Graphics Suite X6! :), thanks Ching_Liu. Great Torrent
